title: The kernell of Christianity containing a short, yet full summe of our communion with Christ. By Francis Peck Mr of Arts, minister of the Word and pastor at Hartford. Imprimatur Iohn Downame.
author: Peck, Francis, d. 1651.
publisher: printed by G.M. for Iohn Bellamy, at the signe of the three Golden-Lyons near the Royall-Exchange,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
